author: andschwa
body: $ BUILD RELEASE    $ BUILD DEBUG    $ POWERSHELL    $ XUNIT   With the recent changes from other work items to restructure the build output folders, dotnetlibs only contains PowerShell build artifacts at the moment, and everything else is copied to exec_env \* subfolders directly, so this is not needed anymore.  VSO create date - 6/10/2015 14:04:00
title: rename and split dotnetlibs into build-release and build-debug
